requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p or Higher recommended
